checkedControlMap - Static variable in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.ValidatorService
Mapping of multiple checked controls to it's controller.
checkedPropertyMap - Static variable in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.ValidatorService
 
com.aeonium.javafx.utils - package com.aeonium.javafx.utils
Collection of helper classes for various purposes.
com.aeonium.javafx.validation - package com.aeonium.javafx.validation
This package provides deklarative validation for JavaFX user interfaces with the following goals: A simple way of declaring validation constraints on a input field, an (at best) unobtrusive way of wiring submit controls to the validation.
com.aeonium.javafx.validation.annotations - package com.aeonium.javafx.validation.annotations
This package contains the default validation constraint annotations of the framework: FXNotNull, FXRequired, FXString, FXNumber and FXValidation for using custom validator classes.
control - Variable in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.FXAbstractValidator
 
createActionManager() - Static method in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.ValidatorService
Use this factory method to obtain an instance of the FXActionManager as a callback for loading an initializing FXML UIs.
createRegex(FXString) - Method in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.StringValidator
